name: MUST NOT LET THE FIRE OUT
name_original: MUST NOT LET THE FIRE OUT
description:
(Mobile Friendly)

You Must Protect The City From Burning To The Ground

As The Water Guardian You Must Not Let The Fire Out

--------------------------------------------------------

To Summon Water Warrior

Follow The Rythm (Audio Advised)
Press "Left" or "Right" According to The Guide

Mobile user:

Tap "Left" or "Right" Side of The Screen

According to The Guide

----------------------------------------------------------

It still kind of boring. Tell me if you have input to make it more fun.

Thanks.. Have Fun :)
